db:select.doc:name: select wish
db:select.db:dynamic-query: select si.sku_id, it.item_type_name, si.sku_name, si.sku_summary, i.item_brand, si.price, si.stock_quantity, im.url, imt.image_type_name from customer c, wish w, item i, item_type it, sku_item si, image im, image_type imt where c.id = w.customer_id and w.active = true and w.sku_item_id = si.sku_id and i.item_type_id = it.id and si.item_id = i.item_id and si.sku_id = im.item_sku_id and im.image_type_id = imt.id and c.id = '#[xpath:/mes:getWishList/mod:CustomerId]' and si.item_id = i.item_id and imt.image_type_name in ('#[xpath('/mes:getWishList/mes:ImageType/text()').text.replaceAll(",", "','")]') limit #[Integer.valueOf(xpath('/mes:getWishList/mes:PageInfo/pageIndex/text()').text)],#[limit]

expression-transformer.doc:name: to []

db:insert.doc:name: insert wish
db:insert.db:parameterized-query: insert into wish(customer_id, sku_item_id) values(#[xpath:/mes:addWish/mod:CustomerId], #[xpath:/mes:addWish/mod:Sku]) on duplicate key update active = 1

db:update.doc:name: update wish set !active
db:update.db:parameterized-query: update wish set active = false where customer_id = #[xpath:/mes:removeWish/mod:CustomerId] and sku_item_id = #[xpath:/mes:removeWish/mod:Sku]
